name: Elite Forces: Unit 77
description:
A new and improved version, now with the Multiplayer function. Elite Forces: Unit 77 is an action game with basic tactical elements. Drive armored trucks and tanks, defuse mines, locate explosives, and rescue hostages. Gather your forces into a crack squad when your enemies are threatening to overwhelm you or control a single game character based on the strategic requirements.

Unit 77 is comprised of four specialists with different combat skills:
*Bill Matic, the "Hacker"
*Kendra Chase, the sniper
*T. K. Richter, the explosives expert
*Dag Hammer, the green beret

Extra features:
- 12 missions, 3 scenarios
- Range of combat activities
- Action for 1-4 players
- Excellent game controls with the stylus
